name: Flashforge Creator 3 Pro (0.2 nozzle)
machine_start_gcode:
; **** Start of Start GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
M118 X150.00 Y125.00 Z200.00 T0 T1
; todo: need to post process Active extruders in m118

G90 ; absolute positioning
M108 T{initial_extruder} ; tool change
G1 X{(initial_extruder == 0 ? 187.0 : -187.0)} Y0.000 F{travel_speed * 60} ; Move initial extruder over anti-ooze plate (9-point Bed Levelling sometimes leaves it off plate)

; Set Filament Z-Offset
G1 Z0.000 F{travel_speed_z * 60} ;
;FFPP-UNCOMMENT; G92 Z-<FFPP-filament_extra_z_offset> ; Value substituted by FFPP script (FFPP-filament_extra_z_offset)(negative is printing higher in air)

M140 S{first_layer_bed_temperature[initial_extruder]} T0 ; set bed temperature
M104 S{first_layer_temperature[0]} T0 ; set right extruder temp
M104 S{first_layer_temperature[1]} T1 ; set left extruder temp

M7 T0 ; wait for platform
M6 T0 ; wait for temp
M6 T1 ; wait for temp

M106 ; Extruder/Heat Break fan on
M651 S255 ; chassis fan on (after heating reached to speed up heating)

; Purge Filament (gets rid of any curling filament too)
G1 X{(initial_extruder == 0 ? 172.0 : -172.0)} F{travel_speed * 60} ; Move initial extruder off anti-ooze plate
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G1 F150 E20 ; feed 20mm of feed stock 
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance


; M652 ; chassis fan off 
; M109 T1/2 only if dupe or mirror

;layer_count: <FFPP-calculated-total_layer_count> ; Value substituted by FFPP script (FFPP-calculated-total_layer_count)
; **** End of Start GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
machine_end_gcode:
; **** Start of End GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
M108 T0 ; tool change
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance
G1 E-10 F1800 ;
G92 E0 ; reset extrusion distance 
G1 X187.000 Y0.000 F{travel_speed * 60} ; Move Extruder over anti-ooze plate

M107 ; Extruder/Heat Break fan off

;end gcode
M104 S0 T1 ; cool down left extruder
M104 S0 T0 ; cool down right extruder
M140 S0 T0 ; cool down bed

G162 Z F1800 ; Go to max Z position

M652 ; chassis fan OFF
G91 ; relative positioning
M18 ; disable steppers
; **** End of End GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
toolchange_gcode:
; **** Start of Tool Change GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
M108 T[next_extruder]
; **** End of Tool Change GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
before_layer_change_gcode:
; **** Start of Before Layer Change GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
; FFPP-layer_z_height: {layer_z} ; Value parsed by FFPP script
;layer:<FFPP-calculated-next_layer_height> ; Value substituted by FFPP script (FFPP-calculated-next_layer_height)
; **** End of Before Layer Change GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
layer_change_gcode:
; **** Start of After Layer Change GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
; **** End of After Layer Change GCode: FlashForge Creator 3 ****
